author: Carlos Beato
comment: I can always find my car. I have never had any problems with this app it just works.🍻

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content: Thanks Carlos for the 🍻 and for a great feedback of "ParKing - Find my car" :)

author: Tony J Deets
comment: Super useful when parking in big cities, Really helped me out in N.Y.C. & D.C. I would definitely recommend going Premium, You spend $4 on a lot less useful things, At least I have anyways.
Really useful, especially with Bluetooth - I'd never remember to set it otherwise!

author: Ivan Schabacker
comment: Very reliable.

author: Edwin Rychner
comment: At first I did not know that to save parking I had to click on the green checkmark to save parking spots in history. I would prefer the word save. Now it does not matter since I know what a green check means.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Hi Edwin,

On the main menu of the app you have a link to the history screen where you can see all of your previous parking places. 
Please update your review if your question has been answered :)

For further assistance, write us to: il.talent.apps@gmail.com

author: Bill Johnson
comment: It works and the support can't be beat

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks for a great feedback!
We do our best to listen to our ParKing users.

author: Andy Man
comment: Love it!

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Hi Andy,
Just go to the Auto Park screen and select "never" in the notifications settings.
This will save your parking without confirmation.

comment: Simply stated, it works!  Well worth the price!  UPDATE Aug 23 2017.  It now is useless!  It shows where my car was PREVIOUSLY parked rather than  where it is CURRENTLY parked!

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback.
We recommend checking your Bluetooth connection.
Make sure it doesn't disconnect at the beginning of your ride.

author: Alan M
comment: Upgraded to the premium version to get rid of the ads and I'm now delighted with this app. Really handy for anyone who has occasional brain fade like me!

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks for your support Alan!
We are happy to provide this service via  "ParKing: Find my car" :)

author: peter clark
comment: Works really well. Love the no ad version.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks for a great feedback of "ParKing: Where is my car?"
We are to assist with any issues you may have!

author: Desmond Winstanley
comment: Good app and does what it says on the box... maybe add a premium feature about adding your vehicle details with mot.. service and road tax due date reminders

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content: Thanks for a great feedback of "ParKing Premium: Find my car"!

comment: I love this app! I'm a senior and large parking lots trip me up, thanks Sterling

comment: The best!

author: Andy Clay
comment: So far the best automatic where did I park my car app. Seems to record every time and with almost no delay. The zone feature sets this app apart from others.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks for your great review Andy!
Please try our new version (3.0) with a lot of improvements.
If you liked it, give us 5 stars :)

author: Paul Mays
comment: This is just too good! For someone like me with a really bad erm . . . Oh yeah, memory - this app is the best thing since sat nav. I'm SO bad, I'd even forget to use this app, but as if by magic, it logs where you park automatically. Wow, a really useful app - thanks guys!

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks Paul for your great feedback! 
We are delighted to help you find your car:)

title: It's Automatic! - doesn't get better than this!

author: Pete Beck
comment: I have the premium package but over half the time it doesn't register where I parked. Some of the problem is that I have 2 Fords both of which have a blue tooth name of SYNC. They are called differently on my phone but not on the app. It doesn't make any difference which sync I select in the app it still doesn't want to register where I parked. I would like to clear the blue tooth connections and start over but even when i uninstall the app, the 2 syncs still show. Many times the park Button doesn't work.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks for your feedback Pete! 

Please try our new version (3.2) with a lot of improvements,
including a brand new design and support for multiple Bluetooth devices!

If you liked it, give us 5 stars :)

title: Flaky operation

author: Jason Megan
comment: The user experience could be better.  The buttons for information and settings don't need to be as big as they are and should appear lower on the screen.  The find location photo buttons should be bigger and in the middle of the screen for quick easy access.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks for for feedback Jason!
Please try our new version (3.0) with a lot of improvements including a brand new design!
If you liked it, give us 5 stars :)

title: Works well .... but

author: marion niedringhaus
comment: For those times when we're discombobulated due to recent affairs, and we feel lost, and confused, by gum, this app will at least take you back to your car.
title: Very Helpful

author: Dmitri Shvetsov
comment: I like it, there were no problems so far, but I will keep testing and will report if find any. I'd say a brief help or manual would be helpful, maybe I just haven't found it yet?
title: Nice app, very functional

author: Margaret Wilson
comment: I especially love the autopark feature. Very nice app that just works. So glad there's a paid ad-free version, too. Worth every penny!
title: Best Car Finder App!

author: David Lankford
comment: Will make visiting new towns and places easier,  now I do not have to think about where the car is,  put my earphones into my ear and get step by step directions. Brilliant.
title: A good solid app.

author: Jeramie Olson
comment: Pretty accurate and offers 3 ways to find your car - map, compass or navigation (Google Maps).
title: Works well

author: Francesco Feliciani
comment: Very good the automatic storage of position upon disconnection from Bluetooth of the car.
title: Really nice

author: Eller Fontamillas
comment: Two thumbs up...you Don't Need to buy trackr bravo..onlybon this app..

comment: It just works!

comment: very niice!

title: Good

author: olga anaya
comment: Gracias

author: John McNeill
comment: Simple to use and works well. If you need to add more parking time at a meter you can take a picture of the meter number and use this information to extend your time.
title: This parking app is the best one I have found

author: Ion Moldoveanu
comment: Usefull and has all the features it needs.  Auto parking not always detected.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
Thanks for your review and for using ParKing to find your car!
Regarding Automatic Parking, the most important thing you can do in order to improve reliability is to verify that your device ALWAYS connects to your car's Bluetooth device.

On any case we are here to help you!
Contact us at: il.talent.apps@gmail.com

author: R Green
comment: Smartly designed parking app gives user more control on optimal way to locate car.  Kudos to the developers.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content: Thanks for the great review of ParKing!

title: Best android parking app.

author: Justin Van Dyk
comment: Keep up the good work! I have a job where I have to park in a huge employee parking lot so after a long day I can find my car quickly.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content: Thanks for the review and for using ParKing!

title: Great work!

comment: Useless. Last parking is rarely correct it is usually at an  exception location. History is usually a list of an exception not where I actually parked.

reply.author: Talent Apps
reply.content:
It sounds like there might be an issue with the Bluetooth connection.
If your Bluetooth disconnects sporadically you will see what you describe.
Please send us a mail to get personal support.
Il.talent.apps@gmail.com

author: Bruce Gotohell
comment: The Auto - Park feature makes it invaluable. It is THE feature that makes supporting the developers worth the money. Without Auto - Park, it would be useless, as I would never remember to set the location manually. Thanks go to the developers.
title: It does what it's designed to do perfectly.
